content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 446.29 - Additional information

State Regulations
(a) Are any
hospital employees represented by a labor organization?
(b) If so, please provide the following data
for each representation unit: (1)

Complete
name of representation unit (including local designation). (2)

Number of employees in unit. (3)

Expiration date of current
contract(s). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
446.29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
